name: Shadow Dominion
description:
Jame Game 26 Submission

This is our first finished game. It is a bit scuffed but I think it's not that bad.

There was supposed to be more mechanics around the cards but we didn't have time to make that because the scope was too big.

Made with MonoGame and exported to web using nkast's KNI framework.

The game is also exported to linux but I can't really test it to see if it works.

(We had to update the game after the deadline, because itch.io didn't like that the song names had dashes in them.)
